amendment.description: Amendment adds the Secretary of Defense to the Task Force on Prevention of Illicit Small Arms Trafficking in the Western Hemisphere that is created by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part C of House Report 111-143 to include the Secretary of Defense as a member of the Task Force on the Prevention of Illicit Small Arms Trafficking in the Western Hemisphere.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
